contents.text: Thank you for calling Redfin San Francisco, where local experts help you find, tour, and make offers on your dream home.
To search home listings or schedule a tour with a local agent, press '1'.
To search homes by neighborhood, price, or features, press '1'.
One moment, please, while we connect you to our listings search service.

navigationGoals: Find available 2-bedroom condos under $1.5M in the Mission District.
I want to browse San Francisco homes eligible for VA financing within my budget.
Run an advanced MLS filter for 3-bedroom condos under $1.5M in Dogpatch with ≥1,000 sqft and smart-home integration, then schedule a virtual tour
I’d like to browse listings in the Sunset District priced under $700,000.
Browse one-bedroom listings under $2,500/month near UC Berkeley with easy transit access.

contents.text: To schedule a home tour with a Redfin agent, press '2'.
Please hold while we arrange your home tour with a local agent.

navigationGoals: Book an in-person tour of the 3-bedroom townhouse on Castro Street next Wednesday afternoon.
I need to schedule a tour of a VA-eligible property in the Sunset District.
Book an in-person walkthrough of the 2-bedroom TIC at 123 Valencia St next Thursday at 2 PM
Can you please schedule a tour for me at 456 Elm Street next Tuesday?
Schedule a tour of the two-bedroom apartment by Lawrence Berkeley National Lab for Saturday afternoon.

contents.text: For direct assistance or to make an offer on a property, press '2'.
To speak with a Redfin real estate agent, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with an available Redfin agent.

navigationGoals: Connect me with an agent to discuss market valuation and selling strategy for my property in Lower Haight.
I’d like to speak with an agent about using my VA loan benefits and next steps.
Connect me to a Redfin agent to analyze comparative market data on a listing and discuss negotiation strategy
I want to speak with an agent about some homes I saw online.
Connect with an agent to discuss negotiation strategy and lease terms for the Berkeley studio I found.

contents.text: To learn about making an offer and next steps, press '2'.
One moment, please, while we connect you to our offers team.

navigationGoals: Submit an offer of $1.2M on the 1234 Clay Street condo and review next steps.
I want information on how to submit an offer on a home using my VA loan.
Connect me to the offers team to submit an electronic purchase offer and outline the escrow timeline
Please explain how I can make an offer on a house.
Learn how to prepare and submit an offer on the townhouse near the physics department, including timeline and required documents.
